rationale: Describes future possibilities/projections ('will produce up to 14.9 million tons', 'up to 15.35 million tons') without explicit calming keywords.
statement_text: According to projections released on Tuesday by pork and poultry lobby ABPA, Brazil will produce up to 14.9 million tons of chicken meat through the end of this year and up to 15.35 million tons in 2024.
